mr.robotto.commons

Enum MrDataType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<MrDataType>
      • mr.robotto.commons.MrDataType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MrDataType>

    public enum MrDataType
extends java.lang.Enum<MrDataType>
    Enum for all used types in the MrRobotto Engine It contains the OpenGL mValue of this type, the mByteSize in bytes of this kind of element and how many elements it contains

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getByteSize()
      Gets the mByteSize in bytes of this type
      int getCount()
      Gets the number of elements it contains, for instance, a vec3 will return 3 and matrix4 will return 16

      Gets the OpenGL mValue of this type
